title: Stealing Snow
description: He could show her that they're meant to be. Sayer is used to getting what he wants. He's got more money, more power, then most and he's used it to get to where he is today. Now that he's settled, he's looking for the missing piece of his life. His mate. When he catches her scent, he figures that mating her will be as easy as everything else in his life. He was wrong. Not only is Snow content to her simple life in the woods, but she's got seven overprotective brothers who aren't going to let Sayer anywhere near their little sister. Not without a fight anyway. Sayer can't stay away though. Not when he's finally found his missing piece.She's his fated mate, the sweet, pure snow to his jaded wolf, but Sayer knows that this isn't a fairytale.She loves her family and is never going to leave them behind.Unless he can change her mind and steal her before she has a chance to get away.Come meet the shifters of the North Star pack as they find their fated mates. These four Alpha’s are hot and wealthy just like the fairy tale characters that they’re based on! These guys just have a little more... bite.
author: Skye Alder
